tool.name: SAGA.table_tools.11
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayTABLE False isArrayFIELDS False output_data_OUT_TABLE $output_data_OUT_TABLE output_data_OUT_SHAPES $output_data_OUT_SHAPES name SAGA.table_tools.11 TABLE $TABLE FIELDS $FIELDS prefer $prefer response $response outputType_OUT_TABLE $OutputSection_OUT_TABLE.outputType_OUT_TABLE transmissionMode_OUT_TABLE $OutputSection_OUT_TABLE.transmissionMode_OUT_TABLE outputType_OUT_SHAPES $OutputSection_OUT_SHAPES.outputType_OUT_SHAPES transmissionMode_OUT_SHAPES $OutputSection_OUT_SHAPES.transmissionMode_OUT_SHAPES

param.name: TABLE
param.label: Table
param.help: Input table or shapefile The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: FIELDS
param.label: Fields
param.help: Fields The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_OUT_TABLE
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

section.name: OutputSection_OUT_SHAPES
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

tool.help: Deletes selected fields from a table or shapefile.
